Q4 2025 Earnings Report - Acme Corp

Acme Corporation reported fourth-quarter revenue of $4.2 billion, representing a 15% year-over-year increase. The company's operating margin expanded to 28.3%, up from 24.1% in the prior-year quarter.

Net income for the quarter was $890 million, or $3.45 per diluted share, compared to $720 million, or $2.80 per diluted share, in Q4 2024. Free cash flow totaled $1.1 billion.

MetricQ4 2025Q4 2024
Revenue$4.2B$3.65B
Operating Margin28.3%24.1%
EPS$3.45$2.80

The company raised its full-year 2026 guidance, now expecting revenue between $17.5 billion and $18.0 billion, reflecting projected growth of 12-15%.

"We are extremely pleased with our Q4 performance," said CEO Jane Smith. "Our investments in AI-driven products are paying off, with cloud segment revenue surging 42% to $1.8 billion."
